column5: I thought I should say hi. I've been lurking here for quite a while now. I live and fish mostly in Bruce County. I'll attach a pic of a recent catch.
welcome aboard Kyle ....possibly see you on a river sometime or out on the lake ...  Cheers
Welcome to OFC Kyle, you live in a beautiful corner of the province.
Welcome aboard.  Love the Bruce and looking forward to your fishing reports.
Welcome to OFC Kyle Nice trout by the way Looking forward to your future reports!!! Leechman
Welcome aboard. Keep the pictures coming. We love pictures.
